languages.text: Сбежав из свиты оскверненно{mf|го|й} порчей Вольного Торговца, Ирлиэт Ланэвисс исчезла без следа. Но вскоре на планетах династии фон Валанциус начали погибать высокопоставленные дворяне, слишком открыто демонстрировавшие приверженность Губительным силам. Жизнь каждого из них обрывал меткий выстрел, и убийца оставался не найден.

After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.
languages.original_text: Сбежав из свиты оскверненно{mf|го|й} порчей Вольного Торговца, Ирлиэт Ланэвисс исчезла без следа. Но вскоре на планетах династии фон Валанциус начали погибать высокопоставленные дворяне, слишком открыто демонстрировавшие приверженность Губительным силам. Жизнь каждого из них обрывал меткий выстрел, и убийца оставался не найден.

traits.locale_text: After she fled the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon on the planets of the von Valancius dynasty high-standing nobles, who were too open in demonstrating their loyalty to Ruinous Powers, started dying. The life of each of them was taken by one clean shot. The assassin was never found.

After she fled the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon on the planets of the von Valancius dynasty high-standing nobles, who were too open in demonstrating their loyalty to Ruinous Powers, started dying. The life of each of them was taken by one clean shot. The assassin was never found.

After she fled the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon high-standing nobles on the planets of the von Valancius dynasty, who too openly demonstrated their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers, started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

After she fled the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon high-standing nobles on the planets of the von Valancius dynasty, who too openly demonstrated their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers, started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝逃离了腐化的行商浪人的队伍，消失得无影无踪。然而没过多久，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝行星上的贵族便开始接连死亡。这些死者生前曾公开效忠于毁灭之力，而所有人都被一枪毙命，凶手的身份至今不明。
languages.original_text: After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝逃离了腐化的行商浪人的队伍，消失得无影无踪。然而，很快，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝行星上的贵族便开始接连死亡。这些死者生前曾公开效忠于毁灭之力，而所有人都被一枪毙命，凶手的身份至今不明。

languages.text: Nachdem sie aus dem Gefolge {mf|des verderbten Freihändlers|der verderbten Freihändlerin} geflohen war, verschwand Yrliet Lanaevyss spurlos. Bald aber begannen auf den Planeten der Valancius-Dynastie hochrangige Adlige zu sterben, die ihre Loyalität den Mächten der Zerstörung gegenüber all zu offen zur Schau trugen. Immer wurden sie durch einen einzigen sauberen Schuss getötet, und nie konnte der Mörder ermittelt werden.
languages.original_text: After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie aus dem Gefolge {mf|des verderbten Freihändlers|der verderbten Freihändlerin} geflohen war, verschwand Yrliet Lanaevyss spurlos. Bald aber begannen auf den Planeten der Dynastie derer von Valancius hochrangige Adlige zu sterben, die ihre Loyalität den Mächten der Zerstörung gegenüber all zu offen zur Schau trugen. Immer wurden sie durch einen einzigen sauberen Schuss getötet, und nie konnte der Mörder ermittelt werden.

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss disparut sans laisser de trace après avoir quitté l'entourage corrompu {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Peu de temps après, certains membres de la haute noblesse des planètes von Valancius qui soutenaient trop ouvertement les Puissances de la Ruine connurent une fin tragique. Chacun d'eux fut abattu d'une seule balle et l'identité de l'assassin ne fut jamais découverte.
languages.original_text: After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss disparut sans laisser de trace après avoir quitté l’entourage corrompu {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Peu de temps après, certains membres de la haute noblesse des planètes de la dynastie von Valancius qui soutenaient trop ouvertement les Puissances de la Ruine connurent une fin tragique. Chacun d'eux fut abattu d'une seule balle et l'identité de l'assassin ne fut jamais découverte.

languages.text: Después de huir del séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente corrupt{mf|o|a}, Yrliet Lanaevyss desapareció sin dejar rastro. No obstante, poco después los nobles de mayor rango de los planetas de los von Valancius que habían demostrado públicamente su lealtad a los Poderes Ruinosos abiertamente empezaron a morir. Todos ellos cayeron víctimas de un solo disparo, y nunca se encontró a su asesino.
languages.original_text: After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

traits.locale_text: Después de huir del séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente corrupt{mf|o|a}, Yrliet Lanaevyss desapareció sin dejar rastro. No obstante, poco después los nobles de mayor rango de los planetas de la dinastía von Valancius que habían demostrado públicamente su lealtad a los Poderes Ruinosos empezaron a morir. Todos ellos cayeron víctimas de un solo disparo, y nunca se encontró a su asesino.

languages.text: 堕落した自由開拓者の取り巻きの手を逃れたユリエット・ラナエフィスの行方は杳として知れなかった。だがほどなくして、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の星々に住まう、禍つ神々への忠誠を公然と示す高位な貴族たちが命を落とし始める。死体はどれも見事に1発の銃撃で打ちぬかれていたが、その暗殺者が明らかになることはなかった。
languages.original_text: After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

traits.locale_text: 堕落した自由開拓者の取り巻きの手を逃れたユリエット・ラナエフィスの行方は杳として知れなかった。だがほどなくして、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の星々に住まう、禍つ神々への忠誠を公然と示す高位な貴族たちが命を落とし始める。死体はどれも見事に1発の銃撃で打ちぬかれていたが、その暗殺者が明らかになることはなかった。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss, yozlaşmış Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden kaçtıktan sonra iz bırakmadan ortadan kayboldu. Yıkıcı Güçler'e açıkça sadakatini ilan etmiş olan von Valancius gezegenlerindeki üst düzey soylular, bundan kısa bir süre sonra ölmeye başladı. Her biri, tek bir can alıcı atışla vuruldu. Suikastçı ise asla bulunamadı.
languages.original_text: After fleeing the retinue of the corrupted Rogue Trader, Yrliet Lanaevyss disappeared without a trace. However, soon after, high-standing nobles on von Valancius planets who displayed their loyalty to the Ruinous Powers too openly started dying. Each was slain by a single clean shot, and the assassin was never found.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss, yozlaşmış Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden kaçtıktan sonra iz bırakmadan ortadan kayboldu. Ancak bundan kısa süre sonra, von Valancius gezegenlerindeki, Yıkıcı Güçlere açıkça sadakatini ilan eden soylular ölmeye başladı. Her biri de tek ve kesin bir atışla indiriliyordu ve suikastçı asla bulunamadı.
